tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RemoteSensingParameters (
    parameter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parameter_name VARCHAR(255),
    parameter_value FLOAT,
    algorithm_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES ImageProcessingAlgorithms (algorithm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE algorithm_parameters (
    parameter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_id INT,
    parameter_name VARCHAR(255),
    parameter_type VARCHAR(50),
    parameter_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES image_processing_algorithms(algorithm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE remote_sensing_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_name VARCHAR(255),
    data_source VARCHAR(255),
    data_format VARCHAR(50),
    data_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE data_processing_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    algorithm_id INT,
    parameter_id INT,
    task_status VARCHAR(50),
    task_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES remote_sensing_data(data_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES image_processing_algorithms(algorithm_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (parameter_id) REFERENCES algorithm_parameters(parameter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE algorithm_parameters (
    parameter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_id INT,
    parameter_name VARCHAR(255),
    parameter_type VARCHAR(50),
    parameter_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES image_algorithms(algorithm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_analysis_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    algorithm_id INT,
    result_description TEXT,
    result_metrics JSON,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES remote_sensing_data(data_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES image_algorithms(algorithm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_processing_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    algorithm_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES remote_sensing_data(data_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES image_algorithms(algorithm_id)
);
